text: Horsfieldia fulva is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree found in Sumatra and Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * de Wilde, W.J.J.O. 1998. Horsfieldia fulva. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Horsfieldia fulva
